name: The Legend of Tolteks Gold
summary: Discover The Legend of the Tolteks and use your Match 3 skills to rebuild the legendary town of Tollan to its former glory! Return to Quetzalcoatl's empire and become a master of the talents necessary to construct incredible pyramids and temples. Repopulate Tollan and keep the people happy as you construct different buildings and make sure you scale properly. Can you bring back the shine to this long lost culture?
